data.text: @amarynow Hi there, thank you so much for reaching out! I am happy to take a look and see how I can help. Would you please DM me with the email address associated with your Starbucks Rewards account? Thanks! -Kelly Jo https://t.co/gOy521Fj9l

@starbuckshelp I just got an email that’s says my starts are expiring... we have had a long relationship... I am overseas much of the year, out of an area to use my points. I do use and acrue when I return to the US, or if I find a place overseas. I don’t want my stars to expire! 😭 help please
